title: Hull Moving Average
description: A smooth, responsive moving average for trend analysis.
author: Community
code:
//@version=5
indicator("Hull Moving Average", overlay=true)
hmaValue = ta.hma(close, 20)
plot(hmaValue, title="HMA", color=color.aqua)

title: RSI Indicator
description: Measures momentum to identify overbought/oversold conditions.
author: Community
code:
//@version=5
indicator("RSI", overlay=false)
rsiValue = ta.rsi(close, 14)
plot(rsiValue, title="RSI", color=color.blue)
hline(70, "Overbought", color=color.red)
hline(30, "Oversold", color=color.green)
